name: Red Implicit
description:
Moral matters concerning honesty that are pierced by hatred and lamented by sadness. About lies that are considered absolute.

Looks like I have to discuss with soe
Regarding the truth that is considered true even though it is true, it is not necessarily a coincidence or wrong which is considered a mistake, even though it is deviant, does not mean depravity.

But the truth for whom?
How to live the truth if there is no hypocrisy?
Is it really necessary?

I made this for a "rekahan mahasiswa" exhibition 2016.

full of history about honesty is important.

Caption/poetry by julian rizki
artwork & visual exploration by kjmwibowo
